descriptionHtml:
MannyGT\'s Mods

HYPER NIGHT VISION
v1.0

[center][img]http://s13.postimage.org/rkyakr2uf/copertina.jpg[/img][/center]

* OVERVIEW *
My character is a female Khajiit and so she have the power of Night Eye.
I\'ve decide to make my own effect and also I\'ve removed the bloom and blur effect.

* INSTALLATION *
Place the ESP in the data folder and activate it by menu launcher.
LOADING ORDER: THIS FILE MUST BE THE LAST IN ORDER OF LOADING MODS.

* UNINSTALLATION *
Just deactivate the mod by menu launcher and remove the ESP

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod modify the night eye imagespace modifier so it alters every lighting mod that use this imagespace modifier too.

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find bugs. Thank you
author: MannyGT
